name: Seth Meyers
monologue: If your main criticism of your opponent is that he is sleepy, so much that you call him Sleepy Joe, then I suggest that your one job as a candidate is to not fall asleep in public.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: All right, what’s going on with him? Hibernating bears don’t sleep this much. I’m starting to think that when they said he slept with a porn star they meant literally.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: at rest”] “I love the euphemisms. Reporters are talking about the former president like he’s a sick cat.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: You called her Crooked Hillary and have since been indicted four times, so we should have seen this coming. When Trump gives someone a nickname it’s only a matter of time before we can apply it to him. If he ever calls someone Hides in a Suitcase to Get Smuggled to Russia Bob, just know he’s in that extra large Samsonite.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: heroic”] “You have to have very little self-awareness to criticize Joe Biden for being old but then call Trump a hero for falling asleep. When Biden does something silly at least we make fun of him on this show. You know how many times we’ve played the clip of him tripping up the stairs? We would never play that and say, ‘Good for him! Stairs are dumb. If I were walkin’ up them, I’d trip, too!'

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: [After Trump flatly refused to be fact-checked over one of his incendiary claims] “What do you mean, ‘No’? You can’t just turn down a fact-check like it’s an hors d’oeuvre at a dinner party.

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: You guys, I’m not an expert in many things, but when it comes to Donald Trump I’m like an FBI profiler. If he ever flees justice I can tell the feds exactly where he is. ‘Gentlemen, you can call off the search. He’s in the bathroom at Mar-a-Lago with his head stuck in a bucket of chicken like Winnie the Pooh.'

name: Seth Meyers
monologue: Screenwriter Aaron Sorkin revealed in a new interview that he’s working on a new movie about Facebook’s involvement in the Capitol attack. He’s hoping it will be out in time for the next one.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: So far the only thing that can keep him awake is an iPad playing Bluey .

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: His lawyers are running out of ideas to keep him awake. They’ve even hired a kindergarten teacher to stand in the front of the courtroom like, “Eyes on me, eyes on you!'

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: Martinelli’s has just announced a recall of some of their apple juice over high levels of arsenic. Apple juice with arsenic? Or as Putin calls it, apple juice.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: Today is May first. You know what they say, ‘April showers bring May flowers.’ By the way, those are the two more porn stars that will testify in Trump’s hush money case.

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: Yes, ‘many devices,’ the most successful of which has been nuggets on a string.

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: Oh so the trial for him covering up having sex with Stormy Daniels is a lot like him having sex with Stormy Daniels. He lasts only a few furious minutes and then nods off.

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: Well then why stop at pregnancy? Why not monitor women for their entire cycle? ‘Open up! Open up, it’s the feds! It’s gonna be a light day!'

name: Stephen Colbert
monologue: Weed and steroids will now be in the same league, so get ready for Phish fans who are jacked.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: [Marjorie Taylor Greene] is acting like such a child, Matt Gaetz asked her out on a date.

name: Jimmy Kimmel
monologue: You know the last time a Republican congresswoman tried to take out a Johnson, Lauren Boebert got thrown out of Beetlejuice .
